QuestData.Title: Call of Air - Mulverick's Fleet
QuestData.CompletionText: I was locked up in a dwarven hellhole for days. You better believe I want revenge!$b$bWe must plan carefully.$b$bFirst, my war riders need targets to gun for - high priority targets. I'm going to need to feed them the flesh of Stormpike Commanders. Unfortunately, those little buggers are entrenched deep behind enemy lines! You've definitely got your work cut out for you.
QuestData.RewardText: Not enough! I would expect this level of work from an initiate, but you, $N? Come on, soldier! HUSTLE! More flesh is needed!
